#### Column {width="50%"}

```{r}
#| title: Pure Benchmark
#| echo: false
#| label: "Evaluation - category freq - Pure benchmark"

freq_data <- data %>%
  filter(Paper.category == "Pure benchmarking paper") %>%
  select(finer_topic)

colnames(freq_data) <- "word"

freq_data <- as.data.frame(table(freq_data))
colnames(freq_data) <- c("word", "freq")
rownames(freq_data) <- freq_data$word

#wordcloud2(freq_data)
ggwordcloud2(freq_data[, c("word", "freq")], size = 1.5)

```
